body: I'm not from the US where thanksgiving is a thing, but I thought seeing as it's a day of thanksgiving there, I'd like to thank everyone on this great platform who made it, make it and keep this place operating everyday. I've been here since about around late July and since then there hasn't been a day where I haven't visited ruqqus.com at least once. I always learn something new here and has been a force for good. 2020 without finding out about this great place legit would have been a much worse year. Thank you Ruqqus!

guild.description:
The official guild for all things Ruqqus.

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

For press releases, visit +RuqqusPress.

For updates and patch notes, visit +changelog.

For ideas and feedback, visit +BetaFeedback

For bug reports, visit +RuqqusBugs

post.body: I'm not from the US where thanksgiving is a thing, but I thought seeing as it's a day of thanksgiving there, I'd like to thank everyone on this great platform who made it, make it and keep this place operating everyday. I've been here since about around late July and since then there hasn't been a day where I haven't visited ruqqus.com at least once. I always learn something new here and has been a force for good. 2020 without finding out about this great place legit would have been a much worse year. Thank you Ruqqus!
